pages.text: A fungus with a humped, warty fruit body that only thrives in the Warped Forest of the Nether.
A greenish-bluish mushroom with orange warts on the cap.
When fully grown, its orange warts grow so large that they can also be used as light sources.
For an unknown reason, Hoglins are afraid of the Warped Fungus.
The Warped Fungus isn't edible, but it's Striders's favorite dish.
According to records, some have succeeded in crossing lava with Striders using this mushroom.
